content.rendered:
Mobile games are one of the most important things when it comes to solving your boredom and the best iPhone games of 2020 are waiting. With so many games on the market, people are constantly looking for something that will actually keep them entertained. We’ve compiled our top 10 games that you can play with your friends or alone and for those of all ages. We’re 100% sure you’ll find something you love.

 

Draw It

This is one of our favourite games to play with your friends and family! Draw It is a super fun game that is heavily addictive. The object of the game is to draw a specific item better than your friends so the computer guesses it quickest. You can then move onto the next object and so on. At the end of the round, the person with the most points is the winner. By winning, you begin to unlock new word packs and different objects.

For people looking for a more VIP experience, you are able to pay a small fee each month and join their subscription list. This gives you access to free coins daily, exclusive words and removes ads. Draw It is one of the best iPhone games of 2020 for hundreds of reasons and you’re bound to get sucked into it!

 

Murder in the Alps

Murder in the Alps is for all those that love crime games. This is the perfect crime and solve game, better than any others! It’s a completely interactive crime story based back in the 1930s. You’re given the chance to find hidden items, solve puzzles and look for clues. You’ll play as a journalist from Zurich and solve multiple crimes throughout the story in different locations.

Best thing about this game? It’s got hours of gameplay. Murder in the Alps will keep you entertained for weeks on end, with different levels and puzzles in each episode. It’s completely immersive too so you’ll get to know each character in a way you never have before! This game is an extremely unique game that is bound to catch your attention.

 

Roblox

If you have children in the family, you’ll already know exactly what Roblox is and just how popular it is. This is a great game to keep the children entertained whilst in the car or trying to concentrate. Create your own little character and explore the HUGE range of worlds that have been built by players just like you. You can play in worlds that require roleplay or obstacle courses or just build your own world.

This is an online game so you need to make sure you have data or Wi-Fi in reach. Roblox is in our best iPhone games of 2020 because you can get really creative and express your own style through this game. There’s no limits to what you can do here!

 

Colour Fill 3D

This is our first game from the list that doesn’t require an internet connection to play. It’s perfect for train rides or just to cure some quick boredom. Once you start playing, we’re not too sure you’ll be able to stop though. All you need to do is fill in the blocks with your snake colour. Be careful not to get cut off by the other blocks though!

 

Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp

Since Animal Crossing was first released, it has hit a really good place with players. So much so that Nintendo have brought out a mobile version called Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp. Here you can search for furniture to decorate your campsite exactly how you want it. You can collect different items and animals to keep hold of. Almost like a modern-day Tamagotchi, you need to look after the animals you collect and watch them grow. You will need an internet connection for this game.

 

Fortnite

If you weren’t expecting to see Fortnite on this list, then where have you been for the last year? Possibly one of the biggest games available, Fortnite is perfect for a more fun and friendly version of popular shooting games. You’re able to play in teams with your friends, strangers or just on your own. The object of the game is to be the last one standing by killing everyone else on the game.

You’re able to connect with your friends and voice chat each other to make the game a whole lot more fun. There are thousands of different worlds, created by different players so enter these to try something new. Keep yourself safe by building protective covers or using it to confuse your opposition. There are so many possibilities with Fortnite and it’s extremely hard not to get completely engrossed.

 

Hotel Empire Tycoon

Tycoon games have become increasingly popular across all age ranges. Hotel Empire Tycoon is our top pick from this genre. Through this app, you have the chance to build your very own hotel and become one of the richest hotel owners in the world. Start by owning a small hotel and work to grow your building and customer base. Not only is this a captivating game but you will be challenged at different points.

Look after your guests by entertaining them, giving them the best food, improving their stays and ensuring their space stays clean. Keep a close eye on your staff to make sure you’ve got the best of the best and enough people to work your hotel efficiently. A lot of skill comes into this game and you’ll feel super rewarded by the end of it.

 

Evil Apples

Many people haven’t heard of Evil Apples but once they do, they never forget it. This is a form of cards against humanity but from the comfort of your own phone. Perfect for a fun night in with your friends, you can download the app and play together. The aim of the game is to fill in the blanks with the funniest answer in your hand. The judge, from the group playing, will then pick their favourite answer and the winner gets a point. If you’ve got a dark humour, this game is perfect for you!

 

Clash Royale

For a game dependent on strategy, Clash Royale is the perfect option for you. This game comes from the creators of Clash of Clans, so you know it’s going to be a huge hit. The aim of the game is to collect cards featuring characters, spells and defences whilst knocking the enemy from their towers. This wins you different trophies and crowns. Building a clan allows you to share these and build a big community.

 

The Sims Mobile

The Sims has been a massive success for years now and if you haven’t heard about it, you must have been living under a rock. Create your own family in a house designed by yourself and look after each Sim. You need to feed them, wash them and put them to bed whilst making sure they make it to school or work on time. Build your dream life from the comfort of your own phone. Every inch of this game is personalised so that you can make it your very own.

 

We’re sure there are hundreds more games to join the best iPhone games of 2020 list. There’s no doubt that our top list will keep you entertained for hours and hours, no matter your age.
